00023 #ifndef _CTK_PREPROCESSOR_H

00026 /* (not so complete) preprocessor helper macros.
00027    major code is taken from boost/preprocessor. */

00029 #define CTK_PP_BOOL(x)  CTK_PP_BOOL_ ## x
00030 #define CTK_PP_BOOL_0  0
00031 #define CTK_PP_BOOL_1  1

00052 #define CTK_PP_IF(b, t, f)      CTK_PP_IF_ ## b(t, f)
00053 
00054 #define CTK_PP_IF_0(t, f)  f
00055 #define CTK_PP_IF_1(t, f)  t

00076 /* punctuations */
00077 #define CTK_PP_COMMA()          ,
00078 #define CTK_PP_LPAREN()         (
00079 #define CTK_PP_RPAREN()         )
00080 #define CTK_PP_SEMICOLON()      ;
00081 #define CTK_PP_EMPTY()  
00082 #define CTK_PP_PLUS()           +
00083 
00084 #define CTK_PP_AND()            &
00085 #define CTK_PP_OR()             |
00086 #define CTK_PP_LAND()           &&
00087 #define CTK_PP_LOR()            ||
00088 
00089 #define CTK_PP_INC(x)           x++
00090 
00091 /* concatenate */
00092 #define CTK_PP_CAT(a, b)        CTK_PP_CAT_(a, b)
00093 #define CTK_PP_CAT_(a, b)       a ## b
00094 
00095 /* simple repetition preprocessor macros */
00096 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT(count, macro, delim, v)      \
00097         CTK_PP_REPEAT_(count, macro, delim, v)
00098 
00099 /* indirection */
00100 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_(count, macro, delim, v)      \
00101         CTK_PP_REPEAT_ ## count(macro, delim, v)
00102 
00103 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_0(macro, delim, v)   
00104 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1(macro, delim, v)   macro(0, v)
00105 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_2(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(1, v)
00106 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_3(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_2(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(2, v)
00107 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_4(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_3(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(3, v)
00108 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_5(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_4(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(4, v)
00109 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_6(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_5(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(5, v)
00110 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_7(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_6(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(6, v)
00111 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_8(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_7(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(7, v)
00112 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_9(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_8(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(8, v)
00113 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_10(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_9(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(9, v)
00114 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_11(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_10(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(10, v)
00115 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_12(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_11(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(11, v)
00116 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_13(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_12(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(12, v)
00117 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_14(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_13(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(13, v)
00118 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_15(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_14(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(14, v)
00119 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_16(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_15(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(15, v)
00120 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_17(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_16(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(16, v)
00121 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_18(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_17(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(17, v)
00122 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_19(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_18(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(18, v)
00123 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_20(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_19(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(19, v)
00124 
00125 /* 1 origin repeat macros */
00126 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN(count, macro, delim, v)      \
00127         CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_(count, macro, delim, v)
00128 
00129 /* indirection */
00130 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_(count, macro, delim, v)      \
00131         CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_ ## count(macro, delim, v)
00132 
00133 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_0(macro, delim, v)   
00134 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_1(macro, delim, v)   
00135 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_2(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_1(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(1, v)
00136 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_3(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_2(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(2, v)
00137 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_4(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_3(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(3, v)
00138 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_5(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_4(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(4, v)
00139 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_6(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_5(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(5, v)
00140 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_7(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_6(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(6, v)
00141 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_8(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_7(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(7, v)
00142 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_9(macro, delim, v)   CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_8(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(8, v)
00143 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_10(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_9(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(9, v)
00144 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_11(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_10(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(10, v)
00145 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_12(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_11(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(11, v)
00146 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_13(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_12(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(12, v)
00147 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_14(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_13(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(13, v)
00148 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_15(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_14(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(14, v)
00149 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_16(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_15(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(15, v)
00150 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_17(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_16(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(16, v)
00151 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_18(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_17(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(17, v)
00152 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_19(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_18(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(18, v)
00153 #define CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_20(macro, delim, v)  CTK_PP_REPEAT_1ORIGIN_19(macro, delim, v) delim() macro(19, v)
00154 
00155 #define CTK_PP_ENUM_PARMS(count, param)      \
00156         CTK_PP_REPEAT(count, CTK_PP_ENUM_PARMS_M, CTK_PP_COMMA, param)
00157 
00158 #define CTK_PP_ENUM_PARMS_M(n, param)  param ## n
00159 
00160 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM(i,array)  \
00161     CTK_PP_CAT(CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_,i) array
00162 
00163 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_0(a,...)                   a
00164 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_1(a,b,...)                 b
00165 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_2(a,b,c,...)               c
00166 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_3(a,b,c,d,...)             d
00167 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_4(a,b,c,d,e,...)           e
00168 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_5(a,b,c,d,e,f,...)         f
00169 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_6(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,...)       g
00170 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_7(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,...)     h
00171 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_8(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,...)   i
00172 #define CTK_PP_ARRAY_ELEM_9(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,...) j
